43  ROS_FATAL("4");
44

77  int aread = 0;
78  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < reads.size(); i++) {
79  for (std::size_t j = 0; j < reads[i]["an_read"].size(); j++) {
80  aread = reads[i]["an_read"][servos[j]["arduino"]["pin"].as<
81  std::string>()].as<int>();
82  if (aread > servos[j]["arduino"]["analog_read_max"].as<int>())
83  servos[j]["arduino"]["analog_read_max"] = aread;
84  if (aread < servos[j]["arduino"]["analog_read_min"].as<int>())
85  servos[j]["arduino"]["analog_read_min"] = aread;
86  }
87  }
88  ROS_FATAL("7");
89 
90  int reads_qtd = reads.size();
91  YAML::Node initial = reads[0];
92  YAML::Node final = reads.back();
93 
94  int ini_sec = initial["header"]["stamp"]["secs"].as<int>();
95  int fin_sec = final["header"]["stamp"]["secs"].as<int>();
96 
97  pumpkin_config["ros_rate"] = (double) reads_qtd / (fin_sec - ini_sec);
98 
99  fs << pumpkin_config;
100  fs.close();
101  ROS_FATAL("8");
